thread.section_title: Houzz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Houzz | www.houzz.com
thread.title: Sandra, TX

author: Sandra, TX
title: Sandra, TX
text: The sellers name is Juno Showers. They sold me a faucet that they knew was defective. They would not work with me for a resolve. Houzz could not do anything to satisfy me. Think about it. How could Houzz do anything other than stop allowing Juno Showers to sell on their web site. They are not going to do that. If you have a problem with something you purchase on Houzz. You are screwed.
